name: Milky Bread
description: Deliciously crisp on the outside and buttery soft on the inside, our milky loaves will be in an instant hit in your home.

name: Brownies
description: Our brownies are truly something special. Baked from a 150 year old recipe, this fudgey yet rich dessert will be the star at your table anyday.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Our famous original chocolate cake are truly a perfect pastry for any ocassion.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Crispy on the outside and fantastically chewy on the inside, our chocolate chip cookies are better than any cookie around.

name: Chocolate Frappuccino
description: Rich mocha-flavored sauce meets up with chocolaty chips, milk and ice for a blender bash. Top it off with sweetened whipped cream and mocha drizzle for a real party in your mouth.

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: Completely sinful, buttery with a sweet surprising spiced flavor. Our flagship product, these cinnamon roll are incredible at any time.

name: Coffee
description: Handcrafted with love and care, this super-smooth flavor will caffeinate you throughout the day

name: Croissant
description: Be captivated by the tantalizing scent of our freshly baked, buttery croissants. Seriously delicious and we'll have a fresh batch waiting for you at any time of the day.

name: Matcha
description: Smooth and creamy matcha sweetened just right and served with milk over ice. Green has never tasted so good.

name: Macarons
description: It’s sweet and light. What more could you want? This tasty treat come in a bunch of assorted flavors.

name: Mango Lemonade
description: This tropical-inspired pick-me-up is crafted with a clever combination of vibrant lemonade, sweet mango and refreshing citrusy flavors.

name: Cream Puffs
description: Light and airy pâte à choux filled with sweet whipped cream, so light anyone will like the dessert.

name: Strawberry Cake
description: Made with perfectly fluffy and tender buttermilk biscuits, sweetened fresh strawberry slices and a rich, light as air whipped cream.

name: Takiyaki
description: Crispy on the outside and flavorful with redbean on the inside, this homey fish-shaped treat will want you fishing for more.

name: Strawberry Milk
description: Summer's favorite berry is the star of this drink—a blend of ice, milk and vibrant strawberries.
